title: Voting Result for the upcoming VGU

embed.description: We asked you to choose which champion you'd like to see updated in 2020, and the results are in. After millions of votes from players around the world, the winner is... The vote was SUPER close between the two, with Volibear just bearly edging out Fiddlesticks.

body: So both Volibear and Fiddlestick won the vote and will get their VGUs next year.
